definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
head rope of a fishing net/guiding principle/key link/class (taxonomy)/outline/program

sentences.english: In terms of the syllabus, it's going to be online.
sentences.chinese: 至于教学大纲，网上会有。

sentences.english: So that's the piece of the syllabus that I can't tell you about.
sentences.chinese: 这就是教学大纲没能告诉大家的。

sentences.english: I want to talk a little about the syllabus and the requirements.
sentences.chinese: 我想谈一下教学大纲及要求。

sentences.english: No sections this week. Look at the syllabus.
sentences.chinese: 这周没有讨论课，请看教学大纲。

sentences.english: The information is here on the syllabus.
Anybody else? Questions? Okay,look at your syllabus.
sentences.chinese: 还有其他问题吗，好，请看教学大纲。

sentences.english: The syllabus, a gallery, and other links will be posted on the World-Wide Web.
sentences.chinese: 教学大纲，图片库以及其他链接将在网上公布。

sentences.english: It's not--Well, we don't have a lot of English poets on this syllabus.
sentences.chinese: 我们在教学大纲上没有很多英国诗人。

sentences.english: Take the time to look at class descriptions and syllabi.
sentences.chinese: 花点时间去了解课程内容和教学大纲。

sentences.english: An adequate syllabus is what China's undergraduate-level translation teaching needs urgently right now.
sentences.chinese: 翻译专业本科教学的当务之急是设计一份教学大纲。

sentences.english: So, that's how we get to the syllabus.
sentences.chinese: 我们就这样讲到了教学大纲。

sentences.english: So what do you do with those on a syllabus?
sentences.chinese: 我要怎么处理我的教学大纲呢？

sentences.english: And the figure training program in teaching program is 5%.
sentences.chinese: 形体训练占教学大纲的比例为5%。

sentences.english: A version of the syllabus and calendar is also available that lists all aspects of each class together.
sentences.chinese: 亦可取得详列每堂课程内容的教学大纲与进度表。

definition: lesson plan/teaching plan/a "missionary case" (a dispute over Christian missionaries during the late Qing)
credit system/grading system (in schools, universities etc)
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
to give classes/to work as a teacher
general course/general education course/core course/general curriculum/general education curriculum/core curriculum
English Language Teaching (ELT)/studying and teaching English
